data.eml:eml: List of unavailable infrasubspecific names originally published in Oberea Dejean, 1835, with nomenclatural notes on the genus (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Zhu, Cuccodoro, Giulio, Chen, Li (2015): List of unavailable infrasubspecific names originally published in Oberea Dejean, 1835, with nomenclatural notes on the genus (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae). Zootaxa 4034 (3): 577-586, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4034.3.9
